original: @390a rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @390a rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya shr'i ya mah'a de b'i by'a ka ra na /
analyzed: a'arya shr'i ya mah'a de b'i by'a ka ra na /
translated: Arya-Shri Mahadevi Vyakarana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa /
translated: The Prophecy of Shri Mahadevi

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time.

original: bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mang po 'di @390b lta ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mang po 'di @390b lta ste /
translated: The Blessed One was in Sukhavati with a great assembly of bodhisattvas, namely:

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
translated: The noble bodhisattva mahasattva Avalokiteshvara, the bodhisattva mahasattva Mahabala, the bodhisattva mahasattva Sarvanivarana Viskambini,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva Kṣitigarbha, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Samantabhadra, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Ākāśagarbha, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Vajrapāṇi,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig pa thams cad sel ba dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig pa thams cad sel ba dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin, and likewise the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sarvasukhamaṇḍitadhāri, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sarvapuṇyamaṇḍitadhāri,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi zla dang / 'jig rten gsum 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu stegs kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi zla dang / 'jig rten gsum 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu stegs kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
translated: and the bodhisattva mahāsattva Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta.

original: de dag la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @391a *//
analyzed: de dag la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @391a *//
translated: These and other bodhisattva mahāsattvas of the fortunate eon,

original: chen po dang / thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
analyzed: chen po dang / thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
translated: all together in one place.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
translated: Then the bodhisattva mahāsattva Avalokiteśvara went to where the Blessed One was, and having arrived, he bowed his head at the feet of the Blessed One and sat to one side.

original: lha mo chen mo dpal yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad
analyzed: lha mo chen mo dpal yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad
translated: and bowed her head to all the bodhisattva mahāsattvas dwelling in Sukhāvatī.

original: la'ang mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
analyzed: la'ang mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
translated: Then she sat to one side.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgya stong du mas brgyan cing de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba snyed kyis yongs su bskor te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgya stong du mas brgyan cing de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba snyed kyis yongs su bskor te /
translated: Then the Blessed One, adorned with many hundreds of thousands of merits, surrounded by many millions of tathāgatas,

original: brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pas lha mo chen mo dpal la gzigs nas /
analyzed: brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pas lha mo chen mo dpal la gzigs nas /
translated: and praised and extolled by all Śakras, Brahmās, and Lokapālas, looked at the great goddess Śrī

original: tshangs pa chen po'i gsung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: tshangs pa chen po'i gsung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: and with the voice of the Great Brahmā said this to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Avalokiteśvara:

original: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
translated: Avalokiteśvara,

original: rgyal po'am / blon po'am /
analyzed: rgyal po'am / blon po'am /
translated: a minister,🔽a monk,

original: dge slong ngam /🔽dge slong ma'am /
analyzed: dge slong ngam / dge slong ma'am /
translated: a nun,

original: dge bsnyen nam /
analyzed: dge bsnyen nam /
translated: a layman,

original: dge bsnyen @391b ma'am /
analyzed: dge bsnyen @391b ma'am /
translated: a laywoman,🔽a brahmin,

original: bram ze'am / rgyal rigs sam /
analyzed: bram ze'am / rgyal rigs sam /
translated: a kṣatriya,🔽a vaiśya, or

original: rje'u rigs sam /
analyzed: rje'u rigs sam /
translated: a śūdra,

original: dmangs rigs gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa 'chad na /
analyzed: dmangs rigs gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa 'chad na /
translated: if they explain the praise called The Stainlessly Renowned One, the One Hundred and Eight Names of the Great Goddess Śrī,

original: rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang / sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing chom rkun dang / g-yon can dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang / sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing chom rkun dang / g-yon can dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: all the fears, epidemics, and harms of that kṣatriya king’s country and its beings will be pacified, and all the fears of humans and non-humans, such as thieves and rogues, will not arise.

original: nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All their wealth, grain, treasuries, and granaries will increase.

original: rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du'ang dpal nges par gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du'ang dpal nges par gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: And glory will definitely remain in the home of that kṣatriya king.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then those bodhisattva mahāsattvas said these words:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: tshig 'di legs par bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: tshig 'di legs par bka' stsal pa /
translated: these words are well spoken.

original: legs so // legs so //
analyzed: legs so // legs so //
translated: Excellent, excellent!

original: gang dag lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams 'dzin pa dang / thos nas nyams su len pa gang lags pa de dag gi yon tan dang / phan yon ni de dag tu 'gyur lags so //
analyzed: gang dag lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams 'dzin pa dang / thos nas nyams su len pa gang lags pa de dag gi yon tan dang / phan yon ni de dag tu 'gyur lags so //
translated: The qualities and benefits of those who uphold the name of the Great Goddess Śrī and practice after hearing it will be just as you have said.”

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the bodhisattva mahāsattva Ārya Avalokiteśvara said to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed lags /
analyzed: lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed lags /
translated: where did the Great Goddess Śrī plant the roots of virtue?”

original: @392a *// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: @392a *// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: lha mo chen mo dpal gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de; spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
analyzed: lha mo chen mo dpal gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de; spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
translated: The great goddess Śrī has planted roots of virtue with tathāgatas as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River.

original: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ba na /
analyzed: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ba na /
translated: “Avalokiteśvara, in the past, in a world system called Ratnasaṃbhava,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bee d'urya dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bee d'urya dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
translated: a tathāgata called Ratnakusumaguṇasāgaravaidūryakanakagirisuvarṇakāṃcana­prabhāsaśrī appeared in the world.

original: de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag la'ang lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do //
analyzed: de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag la'ang lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do //
translated: The great goddess Śrī planted roots of virtue with him and with many other tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang / 'grub par byed pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang / 'grub par byed pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba yin te /
translated: These names of the tathāgatas increase the roots of virtue of the great goddess Śrī, bring them to completion, and always follow her.

original: de dag ni 'dir lha mo chen mo dpal gyis yang dag par brjod pa dang / sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang / nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa dang / lus thams cad dri ma med par byed pa dang / nor dang /
analyzed: de dag ni 'dir lha mo chen mo dpal gyis yang dag par brjod pa dang / sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang / nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa dang / lus thams cad dri ma med par byed pa dang / nor dang /
translated: The great goddess Śrī will proclaim them, and they will remove all evil, destroy all bad actions, purify the entire body, and bring about the accumulation and increase of wealth and grain.

original: 'bru rnams 'du zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang / dbul ba gcod par byed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dul @392b zhing 'gugs par byed pa dang /🔽yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'bru rnams 'du zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang / dbul ba gcod par byed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dul @392b zhing 'gugs par byed pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par byed pa'o //
translated: They will eliminate poverty, and they will subdue and summon all gods, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kinnaras, and mahoragas.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They will pacify all epidemics, harms, conflicts, disputes, and quarrels, and they will bring about the perfection of the six perfections.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dpal stug po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dpal stug po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Gurava

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bee d'urya dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bee d'urya dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathagata Ratna-kusuma-guna-sagara-vaidurya-kanaka-meru-sundara-kan-a-prabha-sri.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gangg'a'i mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad kyi bkra shis kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gangg'a'i mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad kyi bkra shis kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathagata Ganga-tirtha-sarva-mukha-mangala-sri.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa tsandan gyi me tog gzi brjid skar ma'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa tsandan gyi me tog gzi brjid skar ma'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathagata Candana-kusuma-tejas-taraka-prabha-sri.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathagata Samantaprabha-vijaya-sri.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathagata Gunasagara-avabhasa-mandala-sri.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi cho 'phrul rgyal mtshan shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi cho 'phrul rgyal mtshan shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathagata Dharma-pratiharya-dhvaja-vega-sri.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od zhi ba'i spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od zhi ba'i spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathagata Tara-prabha-shanti-dhupasphura-sri.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa zhi bar mdzad pa'i sku'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam rgya mtsho snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa zhi bar mdzad pa'i sku'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo // de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam rgya mtsho snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Śāntacittāsāyakakāyayaśas.🔽Homage to the Tathāgata Praṇidhānasāgaraprabhāsaśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yongs su brjod pa mtshan gsol @393a *//🔽dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yongs su brjod pa mtshan gsol @393a *// dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Suparikīrtinasupradāyanamaṇḍalaśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Avaivartikacakraratna­pratiṣṭhānaśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phags dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phags dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsaśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus grangs med pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus grangs med pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Asaṃkhyeyavīryapratiṣṭhitaśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i gser mdog snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i gser mdog snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Aparimitakanakavarṇaprabhāsaśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi yan lag thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi yan lag thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Sarvākṣaravāksudhānasaṃpūrṇaghoṣaśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab sgron ma grangs med pa'i 'od kyi me tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab sgron ma grangs med pa'i 'od kyi me tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathagata Prajnadipa-prabha-kusuma-sri.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu'i brtul zhugs kyi go cha ri rab kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu'i brtul zhugs kyi go cha ri rab kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo // de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathagata-Arhat-Samyak-Sambuddha Nārāyaṇa-vrata-samnāha-meru-śrī.🔽Homage to the Tathagata Brahmaśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathagata Maheśvaraśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathagata Candrasūryaprabhāsaśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i sgron ma'i 'od bzang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo // de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i sgron ma'i 'od bzang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo // de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathagata Gambhīradharma-prabhāsa-rāja-śrī.🔽Homage to the Tathagata Gagana-dīpa-bhadra-prabhāsa-śrī.🔽Homage to the Tathagata Sūrya-prabhāsa-ketu-śrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgron @393b ma'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgron @393b ma'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathagata Gandha-dīpa-prabhāsa-śrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathagata Samudrapragarbhaśrī.🔽

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i 'brug sgra snyan pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i 'brug sgra snyan pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Sāgaragarbhodbhavyaśrī.🔽Homage to the Tathāgata Nirmāṇanadabrūṭīrṇyaśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snang ba thams cad bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snang ba thams cad bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Sarvadharmapradīpanavyūhaśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po ltar skyes pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po ltar skyes pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Drumaketurājajātaśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro ri bo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro ri bo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Ratnaketurājasumeruśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam chen po'i shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo // de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam chen po'i shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Jñānarkiraṇasāgaratejorājaśrī.🔽Homage to the Tathāgata Mahāpraṇidhānasāgaraśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Mahāmeghaśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i tog gi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i tog gi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Smṛtiketurājasrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Indradhvajarājanandin.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa nor dang / 'bru thams cad sdud pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa nor dang / 'bru thams cad sdud pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo // de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Sarvārthasiddhiprabhāsaśrī.🔽Homage to the Tathāgata Śāntinandin.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Samṛddhinandin.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim gror byas te bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim gror byas te bcang bar bya'o //
translated: These names of the Tathāgatas should be honored,🔽carried,

original: bklag par bya'o //🔽de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: bklag par bya'o // de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: and read.

original: rigs kyi bu @394a *//
analyzed: rigs kyi bu @394a *//
translated: In that way, the son or daughter of good family

original: mo de la bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mo de la bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: will have a great increase in merit.

original: lha mo chen mo dpal yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang lung bstan to //
analyzed: lha mo chen mo dpal yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang lung bstan to //
translated: Śrī Mahādevī has also been prophesied by all the Tathāgatas.

original: lha mo chen mo dpal /
analyzed: lha mo chen mo dpal /
translated: Śrī Mahādevī,

original: khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal rin po ches brgyan pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal nor bu rin po che las 'byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal rin po ches brgyan pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal nor bu rin po che las 'byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: In the future, in the world system called Adorned with Precious Splendor, you will become the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One called Glorious Jewel Born of Gems.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang lha'i rin po sna tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang lha'i rin po sna tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro //
translated: That world system will be adorned with various precious divine jewels.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid snang bar mdzad par 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid snang bar mdzad par 'gyur la /
translated: In that world system, that Tathagata will shine.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang rang las 'od 'byung zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang rang las 'od 'byung zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
translated: The bodhisattvas dwelling in that world system will have light emanating from themselves and will have immeasurable lifespans.

original: nam mkha' las kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' las kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The sounds of the Buddha, Dharma, and Sangha will emerge from the sky.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang padma'i snying po dag las skye bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang padma'i snying po dag las skye bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
translated: And he prophesied that all the bodhisattvas who will be born in that buddha-field will be born from the heart of a lotus.

original: de la ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa brgyad cu gnyis pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa brgyad cu gnyis pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the praise in eighty-two verses called the “One Hundred and Eight Names of the Stainlessly Renowned One”?

original: 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
analyzed: 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
translated: Avalokiteśvara, the fearless one,

original: lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams @394b nyon cig /
analyzed: lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams @394b nyon cig /
translated: listen to the names of the great goddess Śrī.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba /
translated: Consecrated by all the tathāgatas,

original: lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba /
analyzed: lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba /
translated: consecrated by all the gods,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum /
translated: mother of all the tathāgatas,

original: lha thams cad kyi ma /
analyzed: lha thams cad kyi ma /
translated: mother of all the gods,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal /
translated: glory of all the tathāgatas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dpal /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dpal /
translated: glory of all the bodhisattvas,

original: 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal /
analyzed: 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal /
translated: glory of all the noble śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po thams cad kyi dpal /
analyzed: tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po thams cad kyi dpal /
translated: Viṣṇus, and Maheśvaras,

original: lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi dpal /
analyzed: lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi dpal /
translated: the glory of all gods and so forth,

original: gnas thams cad na yod pa'i dpal /
analyzed: gnas thams cad na yod pa'i dpal /
translated: the glory present in all abodes,

original: lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal /
analyzed: lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal /
translated: the glory of all gods, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kinnaras, and mahoragas,

original: rig sngags 'chang dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad kyi dpal /
analyzed: rig sngags 'chang dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad kyi dpal /
translated: the glory of all vidyādhara, vajrapāṇi, and vajradhara,

original: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang lnga'i dpal /
analyzed: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang lnga'i dpal /
translated: the glory of the four and five guardians of the world,

original: gza' brgyad dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dpal lo //
analyzed: gza' brgyad dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dpal lo //
translated: the glory of the eight planets and twenty-eight lunar mansions.

original: aom nyi ma'i bu mo /
analyzed: aom nyi ma'i bu mo /
translated: Oṃ, daughter of the sun,

original: ma ma yum /
analyzed: ma ma yum /
translated: mām, mother,

original: rig byed bzhi'i dpal /
analyzed: rig byed bzhi'i dpal /
translated: the glory of the four Vedas,

original: bkra shis ma /
analyzed: bkra shis ma /
translated: auspicious one,

original: sems can rnams kyi ma /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi ma /
translated: mother of sentient beings,

original: rgyal ma / rnam rgyal ma /
analyzed: rgyal ma / rnam rgyal ma /
translated: victorious one,

original: gangg'a ma / mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad kyi bkra shis ma /
analyzed: gangg'a ma / mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad kyi bkra shis ma /
translated: Gaṅgā, auspicious one of all tīrtha gates,

original: dri ma med pa /
analyzed: dri ma med pa /
translated: stainless,

original: dri ma med par byed pa'i dpal /
analyzed: dri ma med par byed pa'i dpal /
translated: the glory that removes stains,

original: sdig pa thams cad 'phrog ma /
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad 'phrog ma /
translated: She is the one who takes away all evil.

original: rgyags pa med pa /
analyzed: rgyags pa med pa /
translated: She is the one who is not arrogant.

original: zla ba'i dpal /
analyzed: zla ba'i dpal /
translated: She is the glory of the moon.

original: nyi ma'i dpal /
analyzed: nyi ma'i dpal /
translated: She is the glory of the sun.

original: zla thams cad kyi dpal /
analyzed: zla thams cad kyi dpal /
translated: She is the glory of all moons.

original: sengge la zhon ma /
analyzed: sengge la zhon ma /
translated: She is the one who rides a lion.

original: padma'i mchog 'bum gyis @395a *//🔽bkab ma / padma padma la gnas pa /
analyzed: padma'i mchog 'bum gyis @395a *// bkab ma / padma padma la gnas pa /
translated: She is the one who is covered by a hundred thousand supreme lotuses.

original: padma 'dzin pa /
analyzed: padma 'dzin pa /
translated: She is the one who holds a lotus.

original: padma las byung ma /
analyzed: padma las byung ma /
translated: She is the one who is born from a lotus.

original: padma dang ldan pa /
analyzed: padma dang ldan pa /
translated: She is the one who possesses a lotus.

original: 'od zer 'bar ba du mas 'khor ba /
analyzed: 'od zer 'bar ba du mas 'khor ba /
translated: She is the one who is surrounded by many blazing light rays.

original: nor sbyin ma /🔽dkar mo / dkar mo chen mo /
analyzed: nor sbyin ma / dkar mo / dkar mo chen mo /
translated: She is the one who gives wealth.🔽She is the white one.

original: lag dkar ma /
analyzed: lag dkar ma /
translated: She is the one with white hands.

original: bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa /
analyzed: bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa /
translated: She is the one who holds all auspiciousness.

original: bsod nams kyi phung po thams cad kyi lus can /
analyzed: bsod nams kyi phung po thams cad kyi lus can /
translated: She is the one who has a body of all heaps of merit.

original: shes nyen can gyi bu mo /🔽lag pa 'bum dang ldan ma /
analyzed: shes nyen can gyi bu mo / lag pa 'bum dang ldan ma /
translated: She is the one who is the daughter of the one who is wise.🔽She is the one who has a hundred thousand hands.

original: mig 'bum dang ldan ma /
analyzed: mig 'bum dang ldan ma /
translated: She is the one who has a hundred thousand eyes.

original: mgo 'bum dang ldan ma /
analyzed: mgo 'bum dang ldan ma /
translated: She is the one who has a hundred thousand heads.

original: nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa'i cod pan thogs pa /
analyzed: nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa'i cod pan thogs pa /
translated: She is the one who wears a crown that is beautified by various jewels.

original: gzugs bzang ba /
analyzed: gzugs bzang ba /
translated: She is the one who has a good body.

original: gzugs sna tshogs can /🔽rab grags ma /
analyzed: gzugs sna tshogs can / rab grags ma /
translated: She is the one who has various forms.🔽She is the one who is very famous.

original: shin tu grags ma /🔽zhi pa ma /
analyzed: shin tu grags ma / zhi pa ma /
translated: She is the one who is very well known.🔽She is the one who is peaceful.

original: sprin ma / sgra gtsang ma /
analyzed: sprin ma / sgra gtsang ma /
translated: She is the one who is a cloud.

original: zla ba ltar mdzes ma /
analyzed: zla ba ltar mdzes ma /
translated: She is the one who is as beautiful as the moon.

original: nyi ma ltar mdzes ma /
analyzed: nyi ma ltar mdzes ma /
translated: Beautiful as the sun,🔽virtuous,

original: dge ma / dge byed ma /
analyzed: dge ma / dge byed ma /
translated: virtuous one,🔽glory of all beings,

original: sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs ma'i dpal /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs ma'i dpal /
translated: noble one,

original: 'phags ma / me tog la gnas ma /
analyzed: 'phags ma / me tog la gnas ma /
translated: abiding in flowers,

original: me tog gi dbang phyug ma /
analyzed: me tog gi dbang phyug ma /
translated: lady of flowers,

original: ri bo'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad kyi dpal /🔽chu klung dang / mtsho thams cad kyi dpal /
analyzed: ri bo'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad kyi dpal / chu klung dang / mtsho thams cad kyi dpal /
translated: glory of all the kings of mountains, Mount Meru,🔽glory of all rivers and lakes,

original: chu thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i dpal /
analyzed: chu thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i dpal /
translated: glory of the ocean of all waters,

original: mu stegs thams cad du mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal /
analyzed: mu stegs thams cad du mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal /
translated: glory of all the tirthas,

original: sman dang / rtsi tog dang / shing dang / nor dang / 'bru thams cad kyi dpal /
analyzed: sman dang / rtsi tog dang / shing dang / nor dang / 'bru thams cad kyi dpal /
translated: glory of all medicines, herbs, trees, wealth, and grains,

original: gser sbyin ma /
analyzed: gser sbyin ma /
translated: giver of gold,

original: zas dang / gos sbyin ma /
analyzed: zas dang / gos sbyin ma /
translated: giver of food and clothing,

original: 'od gsal ma /
analyzed: 'od gsal ma /
translated: clear light,

original: snang ba ma /
analyzed: snang ba ma /
translated: illumination,

original: lus gtsang ma /
analyzed: lus gtsang ma /
translated: pure body,🔽conqueror of all the tathagatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang sgyur @395b ma; lha'i tshogs thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang sgyur @395b ma; lha'i tshogs thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal /
translated: glory of all the hosts of gods,

original: gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i dpal /
analyzed: gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i dpal /
translated: glory of Yama, Varuna, Kubera, Indra, and so forth,

original: sbyin pa ma /
analyzed: sbyin pa ma /
translated: giver,

original: longs spyod ma /
analyzed: longs spyod ma /
translated: enjoyment,

original: gzi brjid ldan ma; phun sum tshogs ma /🔽'byor pa ma /
analyzed: gzi brjid ldan ma; phun sum tshogs ma / 'byor pa ma /
translated: prosperous,

original: rnam par skye ba ma /
analyzed: rnam par skye ba ma /
translated: unborn,🔽seeing,

original: mthong ma / chos kyi dpal /
analyzed: mthong ma / chos kyi dpal /
translated: glory of the Dharma,

original: khyab 'jug la brten pa /
analyzed: khyab 'jug la brten pa /
translated: dependent on Vishnu,

original: ku mu de la gnas ma /
analyzed: ku mu de la gnas ma /
translated: dwelling in the lotus,

original: bzod ldan ma /
analyzed: bzod ldan ma /
translated: patient,

original: mthu rtsal gyi gnas /
analyzed: mthu rtsal gyi gnas /
translated: powerful,

original: dag byed dang / bkra shis thams cad kyi lag pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: dag byed dang / bkra shis thams cad kyi lag pa dang ldan pa /
translated: and endowed with the hands of all purifiers and of all auspiciousness,

original: bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa /
analyzed: bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa /
translated: removing all inauspiciousness,

original: bsod nams thams cad sdud pa'i dpal /
analyzed: bsod nams thams cad sdud pa'i dpal /
translated: the glory of gathering all merits,

original: sa thams cad dang / rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal /
analyzed: sa thams cad dang / rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal /
translated: the glory of all lands and all kings,

original: rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal /
analyzed: rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal /
translated: the glory of all vidya-mantra kings,

original: 'byung po thams cad dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dvags dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal /
analyzed: 'byung po thams cad dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dvags dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal /
translated: the glory of all bhutas, yakshas, rakshasas, pretas, pisacas, kumbhandas, and mahoragas,

original: lha'i gnas dang / lha thams cad kyi dpal /
analyzed: lha'i gnas dang / lha thams cad kyi dpal /
translated: the glory of the abode of the gods and of all gods,

original: bzlas brjod dang / bzlas brjod du bya ba dang / sbyin sreg dang / sbyin bsreg tu bya ba dang / bkra shis thams cad kyi dpal /
analyzed: bzlas brjod dang / bzlas brjod du bya ba dang / sbyin sreg dang / sbyin bsreg tu bya ba dang / bkra shis thams cad kyi dpal /
translated: the recitation, the one who recites, the burnt offering, the one who makes the burnt offering, the glory of all auspiciousness,

original: 'od la dga' ba /
analyzed: 'od la dga' ba /
translated: the one who delights in light,

original: skal pa dang ldan par 'dod pa /
analyzed: skal pa dang ldan par 'dod pa /
translated: the one who desires good fortune,

original: drang srong thams cad dag par byed pa'i dpal /
analyzed: drang srong thams cad dag par byed pa'i dpal /
translated: the glory that purifies all sages,

original: bud med kyi gnas thams cad kyi gtso mo dang / dpal gyi mchog mi'am ci mo thams cad dang / lha ma yin mo thams cad kyi dpal gyi mchog /
analyzed: bud med kyi gnas thams cad kyi gtso mo dang / dpal gyi mchog mi'am ci mo thams cad dang / lha ma yin mo thams cad kyi dpal gyi mchog /
translated: the supreme glory of all women, of all kinnarīs, and of all asura women,

original: kha na ma tho ba med pa'i gnas @396a *//🔽na 'dug ma /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med pa'i gnas @396a *// na 'dug ma /
translated: the one who dwells in a place free of wrongdoing,

original: yid du 'ong ma /
analyzed: yid du 'ong ma /
translated: the one who is pleasing,

original: sim par byed ma /
analyzed: sim par byed ma /
translated: the one who brings comfort,

original: ku be ra'i snying du sdug ma /
analyzed: ku be ra'i snying du sdug ma /
translated: the one who is dear to Kubera,

original: chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal /
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal /
translated: the glory of the Dharma king,

original: aom sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par gzigs shig /
analyzed: aom sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par gzigs shig /
translated: Oṃ, look upon all suffering!🔽Liberate!

original: sgrol cig / thar bar mdzod cig /
analyzed: sgrol cig / thar bar mdzod cig /
translated: Make me attain liberation!

original: bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bdag la mngon du gyur par mdzod cig sv'ah'a /
analyzed: bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bdag la mngon du gyur par mdzod cig sv'ah'a /
translated: Make all the accumulations of merit manifest to me!

original: aom gam ga sarba ti rtha mu khi sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom gam ga sarba ti rtha mu khi sv'ah'a /

original: aom sarba bi tri sv'ah'a /🔽sarba mam ga la dh'a ra nee sv'ah'a /🔽tsa tu rbed sarba na ksha tra gra h'a pa na ga na aa dhi m'u rtyee sv'ah'a /🔽brahm'a ya sv'ah'a /🔽bishna be sv'a h'a /🔽ru dra ya sv'ah'a /🔽bi shva mu kh'a ya sv'ah'a /🔽aom kli ni kli ni sarba k'ary'a s'a dha ni /🔽sa ni sa ni /🔽a'a ba ha de bi shr'i /🔽bee shr'a ba n'a ya sv'ah'a /🔽su barna dha na dhan+ya /🔽a'a karsha n+yee sv'ah'a /🔽sarba p'urna a'a karsha n+yee sv'ah'a /🔽shr'i ha ma ba t'i a'a karshya n+yee sv'a h'a /🔽sarba p'a pa n'a sha n+ye sv'a h'a /🔽sarba aa k'a la mri tyu pra sha ma n+yee sv'a h'a /🔽sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka t'a yee sv'a h'a /🔽sarba de ba t'a bhi mu kha shr'i ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom sarba bi tri sv'ah'a / sarba mam ga la dh'a ra nee sv'ah'a / tsa tu rbed sarba na ksha tra gra h'a pa na ga na aa dhi m'u rtyee sv'ah'a / brahm'a ya sv'ah'a / bishna be sv'a h'a / ru dra ya sv'ah'a / bi shva mu kh'a ya sv'ah'a / aom kli ni kli ni sarba k'ary'a s'a dha ni / sa ni sa ni / a'a ba ha de bi shr'i / bee shr'a ba n'a ya sv'ah'a / su barna dha na dhan+ya / a'a karsha n+yee sv'ah'a / sarba p'urna a'a karsha n+yee sv'ah'a / shr'i ha ma ba t'i a'a karshya n+yee sv'a h'a / sarba p'a pa n'a sha n+ye sv'a h'a / sarba aa k'a la mri tyu pra sha ma n+yee sv'a h'a / sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka t'a yee sv'a h'a / sarba de ba t'a bhi mu kha shr'i ye sv'a h'a /

original: a'a yurba la bardha ka r'a yee sv'ah'a /
analyzed: a'a yurba la bardha ka r'a yee sv'ah'a /
translated: Āyuḥ vardhaka-kāraye svāhā!🔽

original: sarba bi dva mam ga la ha st'a ye sv'ah'a /
analyzed: sarba bi dva mam ga la ha st'a ye sv'ah'a /
translated: sarva-vidhvaṃsana-gaṇa-sthāyai svāhā

original: sam ham ba hi n'i yee sv'ah'a /
analyzed: sam ham ba hi n'i yee sv'ah'a /
translated: saṃhāriṇīye svāhā

original: padma samba dh'a yee sv'ah'a /
analyzed: padma samba dh'a yee sv'ah'a /
translated: padma-saṃbhavāya svāhā

original: sarba kri tya ka khorda bi n'a sha n+yee sv'ah'a /
analyzed: sarba kri tya ka khorda bi n'a sha n+yee sv'ah'a /
translated: sarva-kṛtya-kṛta-khor-dā-vināśanīye svāhā

original: 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
analyzed: 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
translated: Avalokiteśvara, the fearless one,

original: gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa /
analyzed: gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa /
translated: the one who removes all evil and wrongdoing,

original: sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa /
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa /
translated: the one who conquers all evil,

original: bsod nams thams @396b cad sdud par byed pa /
analyzed: bsod nams thams @396b cad sdud par byed pa /
translated: the one who gathers all merits,

original: bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa /
analyzed: bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa /
translated: the one who removes all inauspiciousness,🔽the one who gathers all glory, happiness, and good fortune,

original: dpal dang / bde ba dang / skal ba bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog par byed pa des nang par langs te gtsang mar byas la /
analyzed: dpal dang / bde ba dang / skal ba bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog par byed pa des nang par langs te gtsang mar byas la /
translated: the one who upholds and recites the names of these thus-gone ones, should rise in the morning, purify themselves,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang / bdug pa gsol nas lha mo chen mo dpal la'ang tsandan gyi bdug pa phul te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang / bdug pa gsol nas lha mo chen mo dpal la'ang tsandan gyi bdug pa phul te /
translated: Having offered flowers and incense to all the Buddhas, he also offered sandalwood incense to the Great Goddess Shri.

original: bklags na des dpal thams cad thob par 'gyur zhing bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bklags na des dpal thams cad thob par 'gyur zhing bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur te /
translated: If one recites it, one will obtain all glory and attain all happiness and mental well-being.

original: lha thams cad kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur la de'i don thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha thams cad kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur la de'i don thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: All gods will also protect, guard, and conceal it, and all one's aims will be accomplished.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
translated: The Blessed One having spoken thus,

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lha mo chen mo dpal de dang / 'khor de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rangs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lha mo chen mo dpal de dang / 'khor de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rangs te /
translated: the Bodhisattva Avalokitesvara, the Great Goddess Shri, the entire assembly, and the world with its gods, humans, asuras, and gandharvas rejoiced.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: They praised the Blessed One's words.

original: 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa rdzogs so;;
analyzed: 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa rdzogs so;;
translated: The noble great goddess Śrī’s prophecy is complete.
